entry.source: {F812}Gabby\0{F87A,11}{F813,0,120001}I speak unto the Blessed Samurai{F801}{F843,0}.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,120002}I ask that you come to the Monastery{F801}at once.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Gabby\0{F87A,11}{F813,0,120001}I speak unto the Blessed Samurai{F801}{F843,0}.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,120002}I ask that you come to the Monastery{F801}at once.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Gabby\0{F87A,11}{F813,0,120003}This is a personal matter. As such,{F801}I forbid you to speak of it to others.{F801}
